title: Paintbrush
summaries: The Paintbrush is a tool which is used to apply paint to tiles. It is purchased from the Painter for 1 GC. Its upgrade, the Spectre Paintbrush, grants a bonus to range.
The Paintbrush cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Used with paint to color blocks
Can also apply coatings
statistics.Buy: 1 GC
statistics.Sell: 20 SC
